attributes.action: ensure that the Brand and Ross incident does not lead to the BBC withdrawing from making edgy and innovative programming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly Andrew Sachs and his grand-daughter were treated appalling by Ross/Brand and the BBC responded in a proportionate and proper manner in suspending Ross. However, there are signs that various groups are using the Ross/Brand row to push their own agendas in relation to BBC programming (e.g. the Conservative party and their statements about comments made on Mock the Week). It is very important that these attempts are resisted and the BBC continues to take risks and make edgy and innovative programming.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
